attributes.action: Remove Nicola Sturgeon & The SNP from power in the Scottish Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
Scotland has gone backwards under the SNP. Scotland is now the highest taxed part of the UK.

In 2014 we had a referendum which was a clear no to independence, the scottish public do not want another referendum.
attributes.background: Nicola Sturgeon & The SNP are mismanaging Scotland with their lack of tangible policies and tunnel vision on independence. The Scottish public do not want a second referendum. The SNP are not listening to the public. They are grossly mismanaging Scotland.
